Dialogue: Talk About First Resort Quest
What exactly is going on around here?
[Accept Quest]
So about this 'business venture'..
Can I help at all?
Um, yes. So, what's going on around here?
What's the problem?
Okay, I'll bite. Tell me more.
But of course!
Well, why not? I've nothing better to do.
Sure thing.
I think I could get that stuff for you.
Fine, I'll get some spears for you
Yes, I'd like to give 4 spears to Chargurr.
But of course! I'll bring you some chompy birds.
Right-ho. I'll go and see Snurgh at the hotel and 'transition' away.
Sure, I'll bring you some feathers.
You're going to ask me to go to the salon, right?
Yeah, sure, I'll go to the salon.
Why, sure, I'd be happy to help.
You sure can!
I think I'm a little stuck.
Can you explain what I should be doing again?
Sure, anything to avoid talking to you for a while.
Talk about As a First Resort quest.
I know how to smoke a trap to remove my scent.
